docs.snippet: The appointment of Jon Parrish Peede comes a year after President Trump attempted to eliminate the agency entirely.

headline.print_headline: Nominee for Chairman Of Humanities Agency
headline.main: Trump Nominates New Chairman for the National Endowment for the Humanities

docs.snippet: In his short tenure at the C.I.A., Mr. Pompeo has brought a more openly political approach. But his clout at the White House was welcomed at the agency.

headline.print_headline: Trump-Pleasing Hawk Goes From Spy to Diplomat
headline.main: Mike Pompeo, a Hawk Who Pleased the President, Moves From Spying to Diplomacy

docs.snippet: For years, caravans of immigrants have headed north from Central America. Despite Mr. Trump’s ominous tweets, many do not seek entry to in the United States.

headline.print_headline: Huddled Masses Northbound Into Mexico Prompt Trump Alarm: ‘Caravans’ Coming
headline.main: Trump Transforms Immigrant Caravans in Mexico Into Cause Célèbre

docs.snippet: West Bank settlement construction surged during the first year of the Trump presidency, an Israeli monitoring group said Sunday, releasing data that added to Palestinian mistrust of the American administration.

headline.print_headline: Israeli Monitor: Settlements Grew Under Trump Presidency
headline.main: Israeli Monitor: Settlements Grew Under Trump Presidency

docs.snippet: The debate on video games versus guns has been a familiar back-and-forth in the wake of mass school shootings for decades.

headline.print_headline: ‘Lively’ Discussion, Like Many Before It, on Video Games and Violence
headline.main: Trump Draws ‘Lively’ Opinions on Video Game Violence but Shrouds His Own

docs.snippet: Mr. Bolton, the next national security adviser, was a longtime commentator. He’s the latest TV personality to go from the small screen to the White House.

headline.print_headline: Bolton, Fresh From Fox News Role, Joins Trump’s Parade of TV Talent
headline.main: John Bolton, Fresh From Fox News, Joins the Trump Cast

docs.snippet: In a court filing, the president weighs in for the first time directly on a case in which a porn actress was paid $130,000 to stay silent about an affair she claims she had with him.

headline.print_headline: Trump Wants Woman’s Suit In U.S. Court
headline.main: Trump’s Lawyers Claim Stormy Daniels Violated Confidentiality Agreement at Least 20 Times

docs.snippet: Japan and South Korea worry that President Trump may offer too many concessions to Kim Jong-un, or turn to a military option if talks fail.

headline.print_headline: Asian Allies Weigh Risks After News Of a Meeting
headline.main: Word of Trump-Kim Summit Meeting Stirs Concern in Asia

docs.snippet: Ms. Griffin, who was widely condemned for appearing in a photo that showed her holding President Trump’s severed head, will play Kellyanne Conway on Comedy Central’s “The President Show.”

headline.print_headline: She’s Back on TV, and Still Taking On Trump
headline.main: Kathy Griffin Is Returning to TV, and Still Taking On Trump

docs.snippet: In primary races, progressive activists are targeting eight breakaway Democrats in the State Senate who have helped Republicans control the chamber.

headline.print_headline: Anger Over Trump Threatens Albany’s Renegade Democrats
headline.main: In New York, Trump Backlash Takes Aim at Renegade Democrats
